0.Major_Activities1: The Society is also running an adult Education Women empowerment centre at chuchot gongma for last three years which is fielding encouraging result and providing fruitful foe the un employed

registeration_info.nr_orgName: IMAMIYA MISSION EDUCATIONAL AND SOCIAL WELFARE SOCIETY

source_info.purpose: To motivate the down trodden people of society towards education irrespective of caste,creed of  Colour.To improve moral education and health care activities. To introduce science and technology for tribal society.To organize the youths of the society for improvement of better standard of living.To help the weaker section of th society educationally,socially,economically and morally within the available resourses.
